amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to plan, design, study, or construct, for the purpose of harvesting timber by private entities or individuals, a forest development road in the Tongass National Forest.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available in the Act to plan, design, study, or construct for the purpose of harvesting timber by private entities or individuals, a forst development road in the Tongass National Forest.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 181 (Roll no. 168).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Chabot.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
